name: NPRNewsNow
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Five minutes of NPR national news, updated hourly, when you say, “Alexa, play my Flash Briefing.”

NPR also offers a news update with a mix of local and national news from your Member station when you say, “Alexa, play the news.”

Both experiences include video on compatible devices.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
